problem.markdown:
1. Performance of Laser spot welding process is affected by ( ) Welding speed ( ) Focal length of the beam and focusing lens ( ) Work piece position (x) All of the above
2. Which of the following conditions need to be satisfied in laser spot-welding? ( ) Highly accurate positioning of the components ( ) Accurate positioning of the components ( ) in the focus of the laser to prevent large variations in the irradiance (x) All of the above
3. Which welding technique includes spot welding modes: conduction and penetration? ( ) Resistance Welding (x) Laser Welding ( ) MIG welding ( ) TIG Welding
4. Laser cannot effectively machine ( ) Refractory materials. ( ) WC (Tungsten carbides). (x) Copper and Aluminium ( ) Steels
5. Can we consider Lazeranko’s thermal model for laser beam or electron beam heating? (x) Yes ( ) No ( ) Either of them ( ) Yes with Modifications
problem.p: 1. Performance of Laser spot welding process is affected by

choicegroup.choice: Focal length of the beam and focusing lens

problem.p: 2. Which of the following conditions need to be satisfied in laser spot-welding?

choicegroup.choice: Highly accurate positioning of the components
in the focus of the laser to prevent large variations in the irradiance

problem.p: 3. Which welding technique includes spot welding modes: conduction and penetration?
5. Can we consider Lazeranko’s thermal model for laser beam or electron beam heating?
